description:
http://anidb.net/ch109968 [Koguma] visits http://anidb.net/ch109970 [Reiko] at her home, and the two have dinner together. Reiko recounts the story of how she took a job at the Mountain Hut Kikuya over the summer as a means to pursue her own dream, something which proved to be more difficult than expected.
Source: Funimation
